turns.speaker: SPEAKER_01
turns.text: I've been wheezing a lot lately. I usually use my Ventolin inhaler, but it doesn't seem to be helping as much.

turns.speaker: SPEAKER_00
turns.text: Do you also use any preventer inhalers, like Symbicort or Seretide?

turns.speaker: SPEAKER_01
turns.text: No, just Ventolin. I was diagnosed with asthma when I was 12.

turns.speaker: SPEAKER_00
turns.text: Do you have any allergies, such as to aspirin or dust mites?

turns.speaker: SPEAKER_01
turns.text: Yes, I get rashes if I take aspirin.
